title: Character Idea "Ozhan: The Ionian archer
body:
Passive: The art of deception, For every basic attack on a enemy character Ozhan gains a stack of "Nerve" when Ozhan has 10 stacks of "nerve" his q,w and e's hitbox's double in size.

Q: Spiritual shatter, Ozhan uses his mighty storm bow to slam the ground in front of him, causing the ground to crumble in a cone shape dealing damage and slowing all enemies it hits.

W: See through the dragons eye, Ozhan lobs an arrow at a target location dealing damage to all enemies in the small area and revealing them for 3-6 seconds. If Ozhan has more than 5 stacks of "Nerve" the reveal effect will last the full 6 seconds anything less will only provide the effect for 3 seconds. Ozhan also receives 30% Attack speed upon activation.

E: Scatter shot, Ozhan shoots out an arrow-like skillshot that will pierce all enemies it travels through and rebound off walls. Scatter shot can rebound 2 times.

R: Dragon Strike, After a short channel Ozhan shoots an arrow sated with the spirit of the dragon. The arrow travels globally dealing a small amount of damage and slows EVERYTHING it passes through by 60%. Ozhan has 2 stacks of Dragon Strike but must use the seconds at least 4 seconds after the first has been cast.




P.S I am bored, this is a joke... pls don't get your nickers in a twist about how this is just Hanzo's kit in LOL.
